mapper.sql: id, name, level, status, properties, create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time
mapper.select:
select n.id,n.name,n.level,n.status,n.properties,u1.name as create_u,n.create_time,n.modify_time from node n,user u1 where n.create_user = u1.id
and n.name like concat('%',#{node.name},'%')
and u1.name like concat('%',#{node.createUser},'%')
and n.level = #{node.level}
order by n.id

select n.id,n.name,n.level,n.status,n.properties,u1.name as create_u,n.create_time,n.modify_time from node n,user u1 where n.create_user = u1.id and n.status = 0
and n.name like concat('%',#{node.name},'%')
and u1.name like concat('%',#{node.createUser},'%')
and n.level = #{node.level}
order by n.id
select user.name from node left join user on node.modify_user = user.id where node.id = #{id}
select nt.* from node nf, relation , node nt where nf.id = relation.source_id and relation.target_id = nt.id and nf.id = #{id}
select nf.* from node nf, relation , node nt where nf.id = relation.source_id and relation.target_id = nt.id and nt.id = #{id}
select name from node where name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
